segments.advisor_message: So think of investing like sailing on a boat. You can control the direction, but you can't really control the waves—those are like market risks. You’ll have smooth sailing some days, and rough waves on others.
segments.client_message: I get that part, but uh, what if the waves get too rough? Like, how do I know when to change course?

segments.advisor_message: Exactly! You’d want to have an idea of the weather, right? Using analytics and past data helps us anticipate potential stormy weather, which is like looking at market trends.
segments.client_message: But, how do I really know if the storm's coming? It feels a bit... unclear to me.

segments.advisor_message: That's totally fair! Think of it as paying attention to the clouds. If you see dark clouds forming, that's our signal. We might want to adjust your portfolio to mitigate the risks, similar to securing the sails before a storm.
segments.client_message: Okay, I see that, but it still sounds kinda complicated, like I don't wanna sink the boat here.
